text: Proud to see 9 UAMS physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 💫👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️ They've made significant contributions to leading-edge healthcare research, placing UAMS among the top 1-5% nationwide. 💪🏼🔬 This is what happens when passionate people dedicate their lives to improving healthcare. 🙌🏼
